* webpack
  - concate file
  - minify
  - 
** 安装webpack
   #+BEGIN_SRC sh
     npm install webpack -g
  #+END_SRC

** demo
   - app.js
   #+BEGIN_SRC javascript
     document.write('welcome to my app');
     console.log('app loaded');   
   #+END_SRC
   - index.html
     #+BEGIN_SRC html
       <html>
         <body>
           <script src="bundle.js"></script>
         </body>
       </html>
     #+END_SRC
   - build
     #+BEGIN_SRC sh
       webpack ./app.js bundle.js
     #+END_SRC
** webpack-dev-server
   - install
   #+BEGIN_SRC sh
     npm install webpack-dev-server -g
   #+END_SRC

** workflow
   - scaffold
     npm init
   -
